channel.title: RuneForbidden 742/744
channel.description:
[center][center][center][img]http://i48.tinypic.com/vijfp3.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.serverstatuspage.com/status/uptime.php?id=3016[/img]
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img][url=http://runeforbidden.tk]Forums[/url] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img][url=http://runeforbidden.tk/playnow.php]Webclient[/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/nkrf1.png[/img][url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/98737785/RuneForbidden%20Client.jar]Desktop Client[/url]
[b]WE CURRENTLY ARE NOT 24/7 BUT WILL BE SOON![/b]
[b]Features:[/b]
Green: Completed Blue: Working/Under Construction Red: Not Working
- HOME: Shops, Teleports and more - 728/742 Based - 20+ Different Bosses - Vesta, Statius, Dragon Claws, Spirit shields, PVP weapons, lucky weapons, 742/744 items - Good starting items/weapons & easy access to level - All Skills working (Maybe not 100%) - All Godwars Bosses - All Special Attacks - Flaming Helmets - 718+ Items - 138 combat, summoning counts - Crystal key exchange - CUSTOM INTERFACE - Hairdresser - [b]Random events with prizes![/b] - Makeover Mage - Working Squeal of Fortune - Working money pouch - Clanchat working - Custom interfaces - Summoning with working familiars - All dupes fixed - Dicing (Old itemlooks) - Perfect pking - Fast and smooth switches - Daily updates! - Loyalty point system - PK point system - Webclient - Recipe for disaster - Full fight kiln - Full fight caves - Fight pits - Dominion Tower - 100% working Castle Wars! - Full Clan Wars! - Duel arena - Crucible - Full Godwars with Nex - Corporeal beast - Queen Black Dragon - King Black Dragon - Full Barrows - Glitchy Prizes atm [b]And LOTS More![/b]
Staff positions are[b] open![/b] apply for them on the forums! Don't just come for staff either... Begging for ranks will [u][b]DECREASE[/b][/u] your chance in getting them! Welcome to RuneForbidden, here are some screenshots!
[b]On Login:[/b] [img]http://gyazo.com/d3ac2d568dd0c769ed612265b697f435.png[/img]
[b]Home:[/b] [img]http://gyazo.com/747034369fbc95b2db24ae73201c771e.png[/img]
[b]Teleports with Grandpa Jack:[/b] [img]http://gyazo.com/9f655b82c9df7f1d8256928dfa4226ec.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/20fa7ae5004496e7cc4070500dd731bd.png[/img] [b]Activities page: (Crystal key coded with portal)[/b] [img]http://gyazo.com/63e179835f679361879504aca83e76a1.png[/img]
[b]Some Bosses:[/b] [b]Nex (CUTSCENES WORKING):[/b] [img]http://gyazo.com/1e2bf306e2b06ff95cc24e66b01afe43.png[/img]
[b]Nomad (CUTSCENES WORKING):[/b] [img]http://gyazo.com/159656dba496a1eb2bfe972b45adf3c1.png[/img]
[b]Bandos:[/b] [img]http://gyazo.com/dca963e9808a46e57fb2defeaadda45a.png[/img]
[b]Saradomin:[/b] [img]http://gyazo.com/211de55c2761cd6e0ce8a742232be4e4.png[/img]
[b]Tormented Demons:[/b] [img]http://gyazo.com/947cd09b68d19424847d9ff6d63030b3.png[/img]
[b]Working SOF:[/b] [img]http://gyazo.com/d0a5f8171dd3851f3f356bcd94992639.png[/img]
[b]MORE MEDIA SOON![/b]
[b]Custom pvp system & pvp shop[/b]
So what are you waiting for? [b]Join Today![/b][/center][/center][/center]

item.title: RuneForbidden 742/744
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

Uhm… Why do you write “RuneForbidden 742” when it’s a 718 server loading a 742 cache?

Read full topic
